LinearAnimation(bool)

Tracks animation state for a region.

Parameters

Methods

GetLinear(bool, float, bool)

Gets the current linear animation value for highlight transitions.

public float GetLinear(bool isGoingUp, float animationTime, bool restartSmoothly = true)

Parameters

isGoingUp bool

True if the highlight is increasing (mouse entered), false if decreasing (mouse exited).

animationTime float

The duration of the animation in seconds.

restartSmoothly bool

If true, the animation restarts smoothly on direction change; otherwise, it jumps to the edge.

Returns

float

GetLinear(float, bool, bool)

Gets the current linear animation value for highlight transitions.

public float GetLinear(float animationTime, bool isGoingUp = true, bool restartSmoothly = true)

Parameters

animationTime float

The duration of the animation in seconds.

isGoingUp bool

True if the highlight is increasing (mouse entered), false if decreasing (mouse exited).

restartSmoothly bool

If true, the animation restarts smoothly on direction change; otherwise, it jumps to the edge.

Returns

float

The current linear value between 0 and 1.

Reset()

Resets the animation state, stopping the stopwatch and resetting the linear value.

public void Reset()
